Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or unstained tissue slides
Purpose: To detect neuron-specific enolase in tissue sections for identification and differentiation of neuronal and neuroendocrine cells.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, incubator (37 °C/60 °C), Coplin jars or staining racks, humidity chamber, light microscope
